content.description: Hiroshi is Harold’s manager at work. Harold brags to Hiroshi that he scored very high on an intelligence test, so Hiroshi forms a very positive opinion of him. As a result, Hiroshi attributes any mistakes that Harold makes to accidents and praises him more than other workers.
content.question: Which of the following concepts has most likely shaped Hiroshi’s opinion of Harold?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
